noSchedulesDescription: Click the button below to create your first schedule.
deleteScheduleConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your schedule "{scheduleName}".
newScheduleDescription: Enter a name for your new schedule.
customizeDescription: Change the look and feel of your schedule. These changes are temporary and may not affect all elements.
editTaskDescription: Update the details for your task.
chooseActionDescription: Choose an action for this time slot.
noTasksInSlot: No tasks in this specific slot.
createNewTaskDescription: Fill in the details for your new task.
templateFunctionalityComingSoon: Template functionality will be available in a future update.
selectTemplatePrompt: Select a template to start with.
errorLoadingSchedule: Could not load your schedule. It might be corrupted.
scheduleNotFound: This schedule could not be found.
exportingDescription: Your schedule is being converted to an image.
exportFailedDescription: Something went wrong during the image export.
invalidHourDescription: Please enter a valid hour (e.g., 14:30) that doesn't already exist.
taskCreatedSuccess: Task "{taskName}" has been added to the schedule.
